item.title: OpenVPN configuration for server and multiple clients
item.description: This is a simple post showing a basic configuration for setting up OpenVPN server accepting multiple clients with TLS. First of all generate self-signed server and client private key and certificates, and dh params. Make sure to write the Organization Name AND Common Name (CN) when asked, otherwise openvpn will fail to verify the certificates. openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -keyout serverkey.pem -x509 -days 365000 -out servercert.pem openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -keyout clientkey.
